item.title: Workflow management with Apache Airflow
item.description: Some useful resources about Airflow: ETL best practices with Airflow Series of articles about Airflow in production: Part 1 - about usecases and alternatives Part 2 - about alternatives (Luigi and Paitball) Part 3 - key concepts Part 4 - deployment, issues More notes about production About start_time: Why isnâ€™t my task getting scheduled? One cannot specify datetime.now() as start_date. Instead one has to provide datetime object without timezone. Probably UTC time is required.
